recommendations.title: Define Clear Performance Targets and SLIs/SLOs
recommendations.description: Establish latency, throughput, and error thresholds for core workflows based on business KPIs to guide capacity and reliability improvements.

recommendations.title: Enable Cluster Autoscaler and Resource Quotas
recommendations.description: Implement AKS cluster autoscaler and namespace-level resource quotas for automated right-sizing, improved load handling, and cost controls.

recommendations.title: Adopt Service Mesh for Traffic Management & Observability
recommendations.description: Integrate Istio or Linkerd to support circuit breaking, retries, granular telemetry, and async communication between microservices.

recommendations.title: Implement Distributed Tracing Across All Microservices
recommendations.description: Deploy end-to-end distributed tracing with OpenTelemetry for all services to pinpoint sources of latency and enable critical flow analysis.

recommendations.title: Extend Autoscaling: Add HPA/VPA and Pod Disruption Budgets
recommendations.description: Configure Horizontal and Vertical Pod Autoscaler (HPA, VPA) for all critical services and enforce Pod Disruption Budgets to maintain uptime during scaling.

recommendations.title: Conduct Load, Stress, and Spike Testing Regularly
recommendations.description: Establish automated performance testing and benchmarking, especially for high-traffic events (e.g., Black Friday) to identify bottlenecks and regression.

recommendations.title: Optimize Database and Query Performance
recommendations.description: Enable query performance insights, indexing strategies, and autoscale for Cosmos DB and SQL to minimize latency and avoid throttling under load.

recommendations.title: Refactor Synchronous Flows to Event-Driven Architecture
recommendations.description: Decouple tightly coupled microservices and replace synchronous HTTP calls with asynchronous messaging using Service Bus or Event Grid for scalability.

recommendations.title: Eliminate Resource Orphans and Implement Cost Optimization
recommendations.description: Clean up unused disks, enforce resource tagging, and activate Azure Cost Management budgets to improve operational efficiency and reduce waste.

recommendations.title: Establish Automated Backup, DR Procedures, and Runbooks
recommendations.description: Configure automated database and persistent storage backups, disaster recovery runbooks, and regular failover testing to meet RPO/RTO targets.

recommendations.title: Enable Custom Metrics, Dashboards & Alerts for All Services
recommendations.description: Implement granular metrics collection, custom health endpoints, and comprehensive dashboards to detect and respond to issues proactively.

recommendations.title: Automate Incident Response and Post-Incident Reviews
recommendations.description: Set up a documented incident triage workflow, on-call tools, and post-incident analysis to improve live issue response and performance learning.

recommendations.title: Establish Performance Review Cadence & Feedback Loop
recommendations.description: Schedule regular performance reviews, set optimization backlog, and use telemetry feedback to drive continuous improvement.
